modName: INSANITY CLAUSE - A CHRISTMAS QUEST Bug Fix and Immersion Patch
summary: Bug fix and immersion patch for INSANE MIND GAMES's Insanity Clause - A Christmas Quest.
descriptionHtml:
A bug fix and immersion patch for INSANE MIND GAMES's Insanity Clause - A Christmas Quest.

[b]CHANGES:[/b]
[list]
[*]Dialogue corrected and formatted to match vanilla conventions.
[*]Quest steps corrected and formatted to match vanilla conventions.
[*]Journal corrected and formatted to match vanilla conventions and to add clarity to objectives.
[*]Rogue edits resulting in mountain over cell 0,0 (Bleakwind Basin) removed with no ill effects (that I can see after playing through the mod and travelling to Bleakwind Basin)
[*]S.C. (Santa Claus) renamed to "The Host" for immersion purposes.
[*]Form ID upgraded to 44.
[*]Removed underscores from new cells resulting in saves being registered under a new profile.
[/list]
Install the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80987]original mod[/url] and overwrite the .esp.
If the author has an issue with this patch existing (he did not state otherwise in his mod's permissions) please contact me.
author: INSANE MIND GAMES
